net.proteusframework.users.model.dao

Class RoleDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2rd.hibernate.AbstractProcessor<Role>
      • net.proteusframework.users.model.dao.RoleDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.i2rd.hibernate.EntityProcessor<Role>, InitializingBean

    @Repository(value="acegi-util-role-dao")
public class RoleDAO
extends com.i2rd.hibernate.AbstractProcessor<Role>
    Default processor for Role
    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)
